bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
On the main webpage under “Free and open source” the url is currently “<denchmark-link:https://discuss.streamlti.io%E2%80%9D>https://discuss.streamlti.io”</denchmark-link> it should be “<denchmark-link:https://discuss.streamlit.io%E2%80%9D>https://discuss.streamlit.io”</denchmark-link> .
